description: This file provides implementations for generating unique IDs using cryptographic randomness, including a 'nanoid' function, a customizable alphabet-based ID generator, and related utilities. It replaces a typical 'index.js' in bundler environments like webpack or Rollup.

methods.name: customRandom
methods.description: Generates a custom random ID generator function based on an alphabet, default size, and a specific randomness source. Uses bitmasking to generate IDs within the specified alphabet size efficiently.

methods.name: customAlphabet
methods.description: Creates a custom ID generator function with a specified alphabet and size, defaulting to 21 characters.

methods.name: nanoid
methods.description: Generates a unique ID string of a specified size (default 21), using cryptographic randomness and an internal character set.
